accordionSection1Heading: You’ve completed section 1 for each load
accordionSection1Text: A load will only be added to your waste balance when you’ve provided all the information in this section.
accordionSection2Bullet2: reports you submit to your regulator will be accurate
accordionSection2Heading: You’ve included all known information in sections 2, 3 and 4
accordionSection2Intro: By completing these sections you’re ensuring that:
accordionSection3Paragraph1: You should always submit the most up-to-date information you have, to ensure that your waste balance is accurate.
accordionSection3Paragraph2: Any adjustments for this reporting period will be reflected straight away in your waste balance.
accordionSection3Paragraph3: Any adjustments made to loads from previous reporting periods will need to be confirmed by an approved person at your company.
accordionSection4Heading: You’ve included any waste sent on in section 5, if applicable
accordionSection4Text: You only need to complete this section if packaging waste has been sent on. These loads will be removed from your waste balance when all the information is provided.
checkStepsIntro1: Check you’ve completed the following steps before uploading your summary log.
checkStepsIntro2: This will ensure that your waste balance is correct and you’re meeting regulatory requirements.
conflictMessage: Please wait until the current submission is complete before uploading a new summary log.
heading: Upload your summary log
insetText: You can submit an updated summary log whenever you need to add or adjust your waste records.
